<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Navigator's Star](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2212)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 18 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A star inked on the back of the hand, usually between the thumb and forefinger, keeps you on the right path.

<document level="2" id="action-1707" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
